comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: I suspect these chaps are either wool buyers...or journalists at an Empire press conference... nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16825289 this 1931 SMH pic of wool buyers looks to have been taken in the same room nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16674478 - here's 1930 nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16453209 - or maybe this is a graziers' conference acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=175371 ha! they're in the sale room at the Royal Exchange building in Bridge St...so I'd cross journalists and evangelists off the list of possibles...just going on the attire I'd guess mid 1920s... [for what it's worth, 9 months on I discovered that this SLNSW pic I've linked to appeared in a pictorial in the Sydney Mail of 28/12/1904, p. 1633...in a pictorial on the NSW wool industry, titled 'From Sheep to Ship'...as of January 2014, this issue of the Sydney Mail hasn't been digitised by Google News...to view it you need to check out the microfilm version or the paper copy] acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=981242 here's 1897 (maybe not the same place) nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16844425 more graziers nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16582626 - 1929 getting warmer (no name plates here)...I think we even see a few of these chaps in the pic above...sitting in different places...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Whoo! Another moment of Flickr genius :) Lovely find Quasymody, it's so great to be able to have a confirmed context for the photo :)
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: the Sydney Mail has better quality pics of the 1929 and 1930 groups than the SMH. Looks like the name plates appeared in 1930...All these wool buyers look the same! I'm not 100% but I think the Wenz buyer appears in all three pics... 1929 news.google.com/newspapers?id=vzopAAAAIBAJ&sjid=M5YDA... 1930 news.google.com/newspapers?id=0XpVAAAAIBAJ&sjid=J5YDA...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Looking at the men in these photos reminds me of the game 'Guess Who?'. Glasses? Side part? Facial hair..? Great images - thanks QM :)
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
